content.name: scissors
content.label: Scissors
content.gloss: an instrument used for cutting cloth, paper, and other thin material

content.name: screw
content.label: Screw
content.gloss: a short, slender, sharp-pointed metal pin with a raised helical thread running around it and a slotted head, used to join things together by being rotated so that it pierces wood or other material and is held tightly in place

content.name: blade_handle_set
content.label: Blade Handle Set
content.gloss: a set of blade and handle that are connected to each other

content.name: handle
content.label: Handle
content.gloss: a handle where human grasp and hold the scissors

content.name: blade
content.label: Blade
content.gloss: a flat cutting edge of a knife
